creator: Motiv Inc.
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: The free Motiv Ring App only works with Motiv Ring.

Motiv Ring is the perfect combination of form, fit and function. It’s one of the smallest fitness trackers available, but doesn’t sacrifice functionality for size: it tracks activity, sleep and heart rate - and can add an extra layer of security to your online shopping, personal finance, social media, work, and email accounts with its new, easy-to-use 2-step verification and authentication features.

Durable and waterproof
Battery life typical use 3 days
Activity tracking, adding and editing
Gesture-based 2-step verification for online accounts login


WHAT IT MEASURES:
Active Minutes
Activity Types
Activity Intensity
Sleep Duration
Distance
Active Heart Rate
Resting Heart Rate
Calories Burned
Steps


KEY APP FEATURES:

The App that Counts
Motiv Ring sends your activity, sleep and heart rate data wirelessly to its app. The Motiv App also helps you set goals, track your progress and measures all the metrics you care about - heart rate, sleep, calories burned and steps - automatically, whether you’re out for a run or out running errands.

Your Health Info Made Easy

The Motiv App highlights your personalized activity, sleep and resting heart rate each day and displays it in an easy-to-read Daily Feed - no learning curve required. Just tap your feed if you want to see more information, like how restless you were during your last night’s sleep


Effortless Sleep and Heart Rate Tracking
The Motiv App starts your day with you. From the time you wake up in the morning, it automatically tracks your steps and heart rate throughout the day. It also automatically detects when you’re asleep and measures your resting heart rate and restlessness.


Always-On-You Security
Protecting your digital identity is as important as ever, but protecting your online life is hard to manage. Motiv Ring now has a new and simple solution to safeguard your online accounts. Using 2-Factor Verification, Motiv Ring can keep you safe whether you are shopping online, checking your email, at work, or using social media.


Improve Your Heart Health
You need to get your heart rate up to prevent heart disease and stroke and improve your overall cardiovascular health. The Motiv App identifies when you’re benefiting your heart health and helps you meet your health goals.


Stay Motivated and Achieve Your Goals
The free Motiv App also now lets you set your own daily step and sleep goals so that you can make sure you’re getting your steps in while staying well rested.


Free Upgrades, Direct to your Finger
With free, wireless app and firmware updates, your Motiv Ring experience will get even better with time. We release new features and functionality regularly so you always have the latest and greatest.


Google Fit integration
You can enable exporting of selected Motiv data to Google Fit.
To enable syncing of your Motiv data with the Google Fit app, follow the instructions in the app and our support articles.
descriptionShort: MOTIV RING - 24/7 Wearability, Fitness, Online Security

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

If you experience issues syncing and pairing, contact our customer support team at support@mymotiv.com.
